Yasuo is already one of the most "fanservice-y" champs (along with Varus), but this skin would be top xD

Also, I don't know if you already know this article, it has some numbers on (among others) male/female "eye-candy" skins: http://gentlemangustaf.com/2014/03/15/gender-representation-in-league-of-legends/ 
It's a bit old and I don't 100% agree with it, but it has some figures ^^
